foreignObject.pre:
flowchart TB subgraph "Input Processing" A[unittest Source] --> B[libcst Parse] B --> C[Syntax Tree] end
subgraph "Pattern Recognition" C --> D[TestCase Scanner] C --> E[Method Scanner] C --> F[Assertion Scanner] C --> G[Import Scanner] end
subgraph "IR Generation" H[Class Patterns] --> L[TestClass IR] end
